text:
Been having issues getting your content (re)indexed? You’re not alone. It looks like Google’s changed the rules of the game, and became pickier as to what content they’ll spend their time on. To help you diagnose if anything is preventing Google from crawling and indexing, and to speed up the whole process I’ve created a 13-step process. I’m curious to hear what you think, and if you apply any other tactics to get your content indexed quickly!
Here’s the checklist: <https://www.contentkingapp.com/academy/google-index/>

attachments.title: How to Get Google to Index Your Website
attachments.text: Boost your online visibility with this ultimate guide
attachments.fallback: ContentKing: How to Get Google to Index Your Website
